# Handy-TimeAgo

Returns Time in ago format!! ðŸ•—ðŸ•—ðŸ•—!!


# Usage

```javascript
import HandyTimeAgo from 'handy-timeago'
HandyTimeAgo(time:String||Number):String
```

# Examples

```javascript
import HandyTimeAgo from 'handy-timeago'
let time = new Date().getTime()-10000
console.log(HandyTimeAgo(time))
>> "10 seconds ago"
```
